verses.name: Luke 1:77
verses.text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins,

verses.name: Luke 1:78
verses.text: Through the tender mercy of our God; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us,

verses.name: Luke 1:79
verses.text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death, to guide our feet into the way of peace.

verses.name: Luke 1:80
verses.text: And the child grew, and waxed strong in spirit, and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel.
